Nan Copeland

Nan Copeland is a web designer from North Carolina living in Washington, D.C. She currently works for Industry Dive where she is focused on enhancing the newly-designed website and creating tools to improve the company's efficiency. When not working, she can often be found at The Wonderland Ballroom or Compass Coffee.
